response.overview: Wish is a beautiful, confident, woman, who makes no apologies for who she is and what she does. Very sexually free, Wish goes after what she wants. If she feels like making out with a total stranger, she will. If she feels like bringing home the waitress, she will, and she will do it with the ruthlessness of a man, but with the finesse of a woman. Wish is a force to be reckoned with, until one day she meets a woman who turns her world upside down, and nothing will ever be the same.
response.title: Wish
